    Learn from our mistakes ‚Äî or repeat them with flair

    What We Regret Buying

    The gear that looked clever, cost money, and never got used.

    ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è The Hall of Shame

    We‚Äôre not saying these items are useless ‚Äî just that they were useless for us. Maybe they‚Äôll work for you. Maybe they‚Äôll gather dust in your garage. Either way, here‚Äôs what didn‚Äôt make the cut.

    üßº Cleaning Gear That Never Cleaned

    • 12V vacuum cleaner ‚Äì Weak suction, loud whine, and couldn‚Äôt handle crumbs.
    • Collapsible mop ‚Äì Collapsed more than it mopped.
    • Mini washing machine ‚Äì Took up space, didn‚Äôt clean clothes, and made us miss laundrettes.

    üç≥ Kitchen Gadgets That Stayed in the Cupboard

    • 12V slow cooker ‚Äì Took hours to heat up, drained the battery, and made mush.
    • Stackable spice rack ‚Äì Looked great, rattled constantly, and spilled paprika everywhere.
    • Electric egg boiler ‚Äì Because pans exist.

    üõ†Ô∏è Tools & Tech That Didn‚Äôt Deliver

    • Bluetooth tyre pressure monitor ‚Äì Lost connection, gave false readings, caused panic.
    • Magnetic phone mount ‚Äì Fell off every bump, flung phone into the footwell.
    • Solar shower bag ‚Äì Leaked, lukewarm, and awkward to hang.

    üõèÔ∏è Comfort Items That Weren‚Äôt Comfortable

    • Inflatable mattress topper ‚Äì Slid around like a bouncy castle.
    • Travel pillows with memory foam ‚Äì Remembered the wrong shape.
    • Blackout blinds with suction cups ‚Äì Fell off at 3am, scared the dog.

    üßÉ Things We Thought Were Cool (But Weren‚Äôt)

    • 12V blender ‚Äì Couldn‚Äôt blend a banana. Couldn‚Äôt even blend milk.
    • LED strip lighting with remote ‚Äì Lost the remote. Lights stuck on disco mode.
    • Portable espresso maker ‚Äì Required five steps, two hands, and a third degree in barista science.

    üí¨ What We Learned

    • If it‚Äôs fiddly, fragile, or fussy ‚Äî it probably won‚Äôt get used.
    • If it takes more effort than the manual method ‚Äî skip it.
    • If it sounds clever but you‚Äôve never needed it before ‚Äî wait until you do.
